name: Reef's Route (April 2022)
description:
REEFS ROUTE

Hi! Thanks for checking out my game, "Reefs Route".

This is the coursework I submitted for my Computer Graphics module during my MSc in Computer Games Technology. I implemented a lighting system (Daylight and Night Mode), instanced rendering of trees for the forest, time-trial gameplay, camera work using TNB frames, a realistic first person mode, GLSL shader programming, FMOD audio and much more. It was created using OpenGL in C++, and without a game engine. This game contains a wacky race track by a farm in the middle of the woods, among other strange things. 

Enjoy! - Reefat
